1.0.0.en:
Initial release of Unraid app for Homey

Features:
• Connect to Unraid servers via GraphQL API
• Real-time system monitoring (CPU, memory, temperature)
• Storage array status and health monitoring
• Docker container discovery and status tracking
• Virtual machine discovery and status tracking
• Flow conditions for CPU, memory, and temperature thresholds
• Flow triggers for parity operations and disk health warnings
• Multi-server support with unique device naming
